This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'xml-soap-2_1'.

author: gdaniels
msg: Add support for serialization/deserialization of java.util.Date and java.util.GregorianCalendar.
Date serializes to/from xsd:timeInstant, and GregorianCalendar to/from xsd:date.
Both of these are now registered by default in the SOAPMappingRegistry, and the changes doc has been updated.
Thanks to Phil Mork (PMork@temgweb.com) for submitting this code!
